GeneralInfo.Name: RadioTime
GeneralInfo.Author: Dukus
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription: Plugin for browse online radio stations from RadioTime.com

SectionParam.Name: Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Online Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Configuration file
SectionParam.Description: The file used to configure the extension. If have .exe extension the will be executed If have .dll extension used like MP plugin configuration

SectionParam.Name: Online Screenshots
SectionParam.Description: Online stored screenshot urls separated by ;

GeneralInfo.Name: RadioTime
GeneralInfo.Author: Dukus
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription: Plugin for browse and play more that 100.000 online radio stations from RadioTime.com
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: * Lot of fixes done by * Separated window for presets * Better preset management * Option for no sorting

SectionParam.Name: Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package (jpg,png,bmp)

GeneralInfo.Name: RadioTime
GeneralInfo.Author: Dukus
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription: Plugin for browse and play more that 100.000 online radio stations from RadioTime.com
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Improved PresetGUI and loading of presets Improved no sorting method (folders always first, sorted by the index as they are on RadioTime) Improved bitrate sorting (folders don't have bitrate so they are sorted by name instead of randomly) Improved add to favorites - when there is only one folder, plugin automatically adds station to first empty space - more than 10 favorites can be stored. presets are shown as they are in the folder (together with empty spaces) and then 10 more empty presets are added for user to choose from - hard to describe :)) This changes are done by SilentExcept

GeneralInfo.Name: RadioTime
GeneralInfo.Author: Dukus
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription: Plugin for browse and play more that 100.000 online radio stations from RadioTime.com
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: - updated for MePo v1.2 (facade changes, version compatibility, .NET 3.5) - fix hints/warnings - updated version to 0.6.5.0 - remember selected item when browsing back - many playback fixes and improvements - few other minor fixes
